thread.title: Manchester United stats: Top five players this season revealed, but no Mata or De Gea
thread.title_full: Manchester United stats: Top five players this season revealed, but no Mata or De Gea

title: Manchester United stats: Top five players this season revealed, but no Mata or De Gea
text:
1 of 6 Which Man United stars have performed best in the Premier League this season? 
Jose Mourinho's side are currently fifth in the Premier League after last weekend's 3-1 win over Middlesbrough , but fans have been less-than-impressed with some of their stuttering performances this campaign. 
There is one midfield star who has been a shining example to team-mates according to WhoScored.com , although Red Devils supporters may not entirely agree. 
(Overall score is calculated through a combination of performance data since the start of the 2016/17 season) 
Scroll through the gallery above to find out which Manchester United stars have performed best in the Premier League so far this season. Related articles
